title: User profile
description: Build user profile: profile setup (name, avatar), profile screen, edit profile. (GH #71)

title: Local storage setup
description: Implement offline-first local storage for habits: choose storage solution (AsyncStorage, MMKV, etc.), CRUD operations, persist habit completions. (GH #64)

title: Setup project structure & navigation
description: Establish the project folder structure and setup React Navigation with the core screens structure. (GH #59)

title: Challenge completion flow
description: Handle challenge completion: detect when milestone is reached, celebration moment, notify both users, mark reward as pending/claimed. (GH #79)

title: Define coding guidelines & CLAUDE.md
description: Establish project conventions and create CLAUDE.md for AI-assisted development. Include project overview, tech stack, code style, naming conventions, testing approach, common patterns. (GH #86)

title: Habit templates
description: Pre-built habit templates: common habits (meditation, exercise, reading, etc.), quick-start for new users, suggested frequencies. (GH #83)

title: Cloud sync & local data migration
description: Sync habits to Supabase: database schema for habits, sync local habits on signup, real-time sync, offline-first with sync on reconnect. (GH #70)

title: Statistics & visualizations
description: Detailed habit analytics: completion rates over time, best streaks, calendar heatmap, weekly/monthly trends. (GH #84)

title: Push notifications
description: Implement push notifications: daily habit reminders, friend activity notifications, challenge updates. (GH #80)

title: Habit data model
description: Design the habit data model with future social features in mind: habit properties (name, icon, color, frequency, visibility), entry/completion tracking, streak calculation logic. (GH #63)

title: Activity feed
description: Build social activity feed: friend habit completions, new challenges set, challenge completions, new habits started. (GH #82)

title: Polish & animations
description: Add delightful micro-interactions: completion animations, smooth transitions, haptic feedback, overall UX polish. (GH #68)

title: Per-habit visibility settings
description: Add visibility controls to habits: all friends / selected friends / private, friend selection UI, enforce visibility in queries. (GH #73)

title: Today screen
description: Build the main Today screen: display today's habits, check off/complete habits, show current streaks, clean minimalistic design. (GH #65)

title: Friend system
description: Implement friend connections: send friend request, accept/decline friend request, remove friend, friend list management. (GH #72)

title: Setup CI/CD with GitHub Actions
description: Create GitHub Actions workflow for linting, type checking, and build verification. (GH #58)

title: Setup ESLint & Prettier
description: Configure ESLint and Prettier for consistent code style and linting across the project. (GH #56)

title: Link agents.md with @ reference in CLAUDE.md
Create project CLAUDE.md with bd init
Complex milestone types
description: Add more milestone options: X days in Y period, total completions, custom date ranges. (GH #81)

title: Challenge tracking & progress
description: Track challenge progress: display active challenges on habit detail, progress indicator, days remaining / streak status. (GH #78)

title: Challenge data model
description: Design the challenge/reward data model: challenge properties (habit, milestone type, target, reward description), challenge states (active, completed, failed), link to habit and users. (GH #76)

title: Supabase Auth integration
description: Implement user authentication with Supabase: sign up flow, sign in flow, password reset, session management. (GH #69)

title: Setup Supabase projects (dev & prod)
description: Create and configure Supabase projects for both environments (dev and prod). Install CLI, create projects, setup env files, configure client. (GH #60)

title: Setup testing infrastructure
description: Configure Jest and React Native Testing Library for unit and component testing. (GH #61)

title: Habit CRUD operations
description: Implement habit management: create new habit, edit existing habit, delete habit, archive habit. (GH #66)

title: Settings & customization
description: App settings and preferences: notification preferences, theme/appearance options, default visibility settings, account management. (GH #85)

title: Setup Husky pre-commit hooks
description: Configure Husky to run linting and type-checking before commits. (GH #57)

title: Habit detail screen
description: Build the habit detail view: habit history/calendar view, streak statistics, completion rate, space for future challenge display. (GH #67)

title: Create challenge flow
description: Build the UI for setting a challenge on a friend's habit: select milestone type, set target number, describe the experience-based reward, confirm and send. (GH #77)

title: Design system foundation
description: Establish the design system: color palette, typography scale, spacing system, core UI components (buttons, inputs, cards). (GH #62)

title: Friend profile screen
description: Build the friend profile view: view friend's visible habits, see their progress/streaks, entry point for setting challenges. (GH #75)

title: Friends screen
description: Build the friends list screen: display all friends, show friend's habit count/activity, navigate to friend profile. (GH #74)
